text: Need James Wilson for JB Hi-Fi campaign. Budget around $28,726, looking for 1 x Facebook story, 1 x TikTok video, 2 x Instagram story, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Product photography. 5 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
